message: Let's start fair, but I'm aiming for the lion's share. You get 10% to start, but I hope to see some more flexibility in the next rounds.
You started high, I'll meet you in the middle. Will you reconsider?
I'm willing to compromise, but 60/40 is my final offer.  Let's end this before the inflation eats away any more of our potential gains.
